cosmos.question: I am the star you see during the day. I give Earth light and warmth. What am I?

hints.text: 🔥 I am very hot!
☀️ Plants need me to grow.
😎 You need sunglasses to look at me directly.

cosmos.question: I am Earth's natural satellite. I shine at night by reflecting the sun's light. What am I?

hints.text: 🌕 I have phases, like full and crescent.
🐺 Werewolves are said to be active during my full phase.
🚀 Astronauts have walked on me.

cosmos.question: I am a big ball of gas that gives off light and heat. I am very far away, except for the sun. What am I?

hints.text: ✨ I twinkle in the night sky.
🔭 People study me with telescopes.
🌌 I am part of a galaxy.

cosmos.question: I am the planet we live on. I have lots of water and land. What am I?

hints.text: 💧 I am mostly covered in blue.
🌍 I am the third planet from the sun.
🌱 I have lots of plants and animals.

cosmos.question: I am a group of stars that make a picture in the night sky. What am I?

hints.text: ursa 🐻 I have names like The Big Dipper.
✨ People use me to navigate.
📜 Ancient people told stories about me.

cosmos.question: I am a small, rocky object that orbits the Sun. I am much smaller than a planet. What am I?

hints.text: ☄️ I can sometimes be seen with a tail of light.
💥 I can crash into planets.
👨‍🚀 NASA tracks my path.

cosmos.question: I am a very large group of stars, gas, and dust held together by gravity. What am I?

hints.text: 💫 Our solar system is part of me.
🌀 I can be spiral, elliptical, or irregular in shape.
🌌 There are billions of me in the universe.

cosmos.question: I am a cold, icy body that releases gas and dust. I have a tail when I get closer to the sun. What am I?

hints.text: ❄️ I am made of ice, dust and gas.
🔭 My tail always points away from the sun.
🌠 I appear periodically.

cosmos.question: I am the force that holds planets in orbit around the sun and keeps you on the ground. What am I?

hints.text: 🍎 An apple falling from a tree helped discover me.
⚖️ I keep the Earth from floating away.
⬆️ I pull things downwards.

cosmos.question: I am a place in space where gravity is so strong that nothing, not even light, can escape. What am I?

hints.text: ⚫ I can be formed when a massive star dies.
🌌 I warp space and time.
🕳️ I suck everything around me in.

plant.question: I have roots, but no feet. I wear a green coat, but have no arms. What am I?

hints.text: 🌱 I start as a tiny seed.
☀️ I need sunshine to grow.
🌳 I can be very tall.

plant.question: I am a yummy vegetable that bunnies love to eat. I grow under the ground. What am I?

hints.text: 🥕 I am orange.
🐰 Rabbits love to munch on me.
🌍 I grow in the dirt.

plant.question: I have a stem, leaves, and beautiful colors. People give me as a gift. What am I?

hints.text: 💐 I smell sweet.
💧 I need water to stay alive.
🌷 I can be red, yellow, pink, or many other colors.

plant.question: I am a plant that can be ground into flour. People use me to make bread. What am I?

hints.text: 🌾 I grow tall in fields.
🍞 My grains are used for baking.
🚜 Farmers harvest me.

plant.question: I am green and grow on trees. Birds make their homes in me. What am I?

hints.text: 🍃 I fall off in the autumn on some trees.
🌳 I use sunlight to make food for the tree.
🐛 Caterpillars sometimes eat me.

plant.question: I am a fruit that grows on a vine and can be green, red, or purple. Sometimes I am made into juice. What am I?

hints.text: 🍇 I grow in bunches.
🍷 I can be fermented into wine.
😋 I am sweet and juicy.

plant.question: I have a prickly outside but a sweet, juicy inside. I grow in hot places. What am I?

hints.text: 🌵 I'm a type of cactus fruit.
🏜️ I help you stay hydrated in the desert.
🇲🇽 Some people eat me in Mexico.

plant.question: I am a seed that pops when heated. People like to eat me at the movies. What am I?

hints.text: 🍿 I am often covered in butter and salt.
🌽 I come from a cob.
🎬 I am a popular snack.

plant.question: I am a tall plant with a strong stem. People use me to build houses and make paper. What am I?

hints.text: 🪵 I have rings that tell you how old I am.
🪓 Loggers cut me down.
🐻 Bears sometimes live in me.

plant.question: I am a green plant with tiny leaves. I creep along the ground and can be used to make a garden more beautiful. What am I?

hints.text: 🌿 I am often found in shady areas.
🌱 I am not a tree or a flower.
🌧️ I grow well in moist conditions.
